name: Aircrafts Stunt Sky
description:
Sit down at the helm of the combat aircraft and fly into the enticing sky. Train your skills in training assignments and become a real ace.

Features:
- Stunning 3D graphics.
- Realistic control of the aircraft. Simulator.
- Exciting tasks.
- Various air and ground vehicles.
- Realistic historical atmosphere of the game.
- A big open world.
